org.epochx.gp.representation
Class GPCandidateProgram

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.representation.CandidateProgram
      org.epochx.gp.representation.GPCandidateProgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<CandidateProgram>
public class GPCandidateProgram
extends CandidateProgram

A GPCandidateProgram encapsulates an individual program within a generation of a GP run.

Instances of GPCandidateProgram can be requested to evaluate themselves, which will trigger an evaluation of each Node and their child nodes recursively down the tree. As well as the program tree itself, each GPCandidateProgram allows the retrieval of meta-data about the program.

Constructor Detail

GPCandidateProgram

public GPCandidateProgram(GPModel model)

GPCandidateProgram

public GPCandidateProgram(Node rootNode,
                          GPModel model)
Constructs a new program individual where rootNode is the top most node in the program, and which may have 0 or more child nodes.

Parameters:
rootNode - the Node of the program tree which is the parent to all other nodes. It may be either a FunctionNode or a TerminalNode
model - the controlling model which provides the configuration parameters for the run.
Method Detail

evaluate

public java.lang.Object evaluate()
Evaluates the candidate program by triggering a recursive evaluation of the node tree from the root.

Returns:
The result of the evaluation of the program.

getRootNode

public Node getRootNode()
Returns the root node of the node tree held by the candidate program.

Returns:
The root node of the node tree.

setRootNode

public void setRootNode(Node rootNode)

getNthNode

public Node getNthNode(int n)
Returns the nth node in the GPCandidateProgram. The program tree is traversed in pre-order (depth-first), indexed from 0 so that the root node is at node 0.

Parameters:
n - The index of the node required. Indexes are from zero.
Returns:
The node at the specified index.

setNthNode

public void setNthNode(int n,
                       Node newNode)
Replaces the node at the specified position in the GPCandidateProgram with the specified node.

Parameters:
n - index of the node to replace.
newNode - node to be set at the specified position.

getNodesAtDepth

public java.util.List<Node> getNodesAtDepth(int depth)
Retrieves all the nodes in the program tree at a specified depth. If a negative depth is supplied then an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown. However, no exception will be thrown if a depth greater than the program's maximum depth is used. In this case an empty list will be returned.

Parameters:
depth - the specified depth of the nodes.
Returns:
a List of all the nodes at the specified depth.

getFitness

public double getFitness()
Requests the controlling model to calculate the fitness of this GPCandidateProgram.

Specified by:
getFitness in class CandidateProgram
Returns:
the fitness of this candidate program according to the model.

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Description copied from class: CandidateProgram
Tests whether this CandidateProgram is valid according to any restrictions in the model. For example, certain implementations may test that it does not exceed any maximum depth or length parameter.

Specified by:
isValid in class CandidateProgram
Returns:
true if this program abides by all restrictions and false otherwise.

clone

public GPCandidateProgram clone()
Creates and returns a copy of this program. The clone includes a deep copy of all the program nodes, so after calling this method none of the clones nodes will refer to the same instance.

Overrides:
clone in class CandidateProgram
Returns:
a clone of this GPCandidateProgram instance.

public java.lang.String toString()
Return a string representation of the program node tree.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of this program instance.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
This equals method compares the given object to this GPCandidateProgram to determine if they are equal. Equivalence is defined by their both being instances of GPCandidateProgram and them having equal program node trees according to the equals methods of the root node.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
obj - an object to be compared for equivalence.
Returns:
true if this GPCandidateProgram is the same as the obj argument; false otherwise.
